00016  *  which mixes C++ with objective C. To enable this: for each
00017  *  source file which will include/import this header file, select
00018  *  it in Xcode and open it's "Info". To enable mixed compilation,
00019  *  for the file's "File Type" select: "sourcecode.cpp.objcpp".

00055 #pragma mark OORecord abstract superclass for records
00056 
00057 /**
00058  Superclass which can be used for all record classes to simplify interface to
00059  sqlite database. Any class can be a record class but subclasses of this class
00060  can use methods such as insert, update etc and be automatically registered 
00061  using [registerSubclassesOf:[OORecord class]].
00062  */
00063 
00064 @interface OORecord : NSObject {
00065 }

00075 - (void)upsert;

00086

00088 + (BOOL)exportTo:(const OOFile &)file delimiter:(const OOString &)delim;

00148 @class OOAdaptor;

00150 #pragma mark OODatabase is the low level interface to a particular database
00151 
00152 /**
00153  Simple persistence class for Objective-C objects using a "sqlite" database. Instances a
00154  class are automatically bound to a table with the class name for insert, update and delete.
00155  
00156  A table with the same name as the class is created automatically when you perform any
00157  operation on instances of that class with columns corresponding to the instance variables
00158  of the class except those which begin with the character "_". If an instance variable 
00159  starts with an upper case letter it will be indexed.
00160  
00161  To update a record, fetch it and call the update: method passing it in as the argument to 
00162  save it's preious values. You can then modify it and call commit to update it's record.
00163  Delete operations on objects also accumulate and need to be commited to take effect.
00164  */
00165 
00166 @interface OODatabase : NSObject {
00167     OODictionary<OOMetaData *> tableMetaDataByClassName;
00168     OORef<OOAdaptor *> adaptor;
00169 @public
00170     OOArray<OODictionary<NSValue *> > transaction, results;
00171     int errcode, updateCount;
00172     char *errmsg;
00173     OOString lastSQL;
00174 }
00175 
00176 + (OODatabase *)sharedInstance;
00177 + (OODatabase *)sharedInstanceForPath:(const OOString &)path;
00178 
00179 + (BOOL)exec:(const OOString &)sql, ...;
00180 + (OOArray<id>)select:(const OOString &)select intoClass:(Class)recordClass joinFrom:(id)parent;
00181 + (OOArray<id>)select:(const OOString &)select intoClass:(Class)recordClass;
00182 + (OOArray<id>)select:(const OOString &)select;
00183 
00184 + (int)insertArray:(const OOArray<id> &)objects;
00185 + (int)deleteArray:(const OOArray<id> &)objects;
00186 
00187 + (int)insert:(id)object;
00188 + (int)delete:(id)object;
00189 + (int)update:(id)object;
00190

00192 + (int)upsert:(id)object;
00193

00195 + (int)rollback;

00234 #pragma mark OOTable records represent database object
00235 
00236 /**
00237  record class for sqlite3's master table of database objects
00238  */
00239 
00240 @interface OOTable {
00241     OOString type, name, tbl_name;
00242     int rootpage;

00246 
00247 #pragma mark C++ interface to OODB
00248 
00249 template <typename ETYPE>
00250 oo_inline int OOArray<ETYPE>::fetch( id parent, const OOString &sql ) {
00251     return *this = [[OODatabase sharedInstance] select:sql intoClass:[typeof *(ETYPE)0 class] joinFrom:parent];
00252 }
00253 
00254 /**
00255  Experimental even more operator overloaded interface to OODatabase.
00256  */
00257 
00258 extern class OOOODatabase {
00259 public:
00260     BOOL autocommit, autorelease;
00261     oo_inline OOOODatabase() {
00262         autocommit = YES;
00263         autorelease = NO;
00264     }
00265     oo_inline int commit() {
00266         return [OODatabase commit];     
00267     }
00268     oo_inline id autowhatever( id record ) {
00269         if ( autocommit )
00270             commit();
00271         if ( autorelease )
00272             [record release];
00273         return autorelease ? nil : record;
00274     }
00275     oo_inline id operator += ( id record ) {
00276         [[OODatabase sharedInstance] insert:record];
00277         return autowhatever( record );
00278     }
00279     oo_inline id operator -= ( id record ) {
00280         [[OODatabase sharedInstance] delete:record];
00281         return autowhatever( record );
00282     }
00283     oo_inline id operator *= ( id record ) {
00284         [[OODatabase sharedInstance] update:record];
00285         return record;
00286     }
00287     oo_inline OOArray<id> operator >> ( Class recordClass ) {
00288         return [recordClass select];
00289     }
00290     oo_inline OOArray<id> operator >> ( id filter ) {
00291         return [[filter class] selectRecordsRelatedTo:filter];
00292     }
00293 } OODB;
00294 
00295 template <typename ETYPE>
00296 inline OOArray<ETYPE> operator >> ( const OOOODatabase &oodb, OOArray<ETYPE> &arr ) {
00297     return arr.fetch();
00298 }
